nodes.text: Malmourral was the Bardottan demon of war which was worshipped by the Frangawl Cult, a sect of the Dagoyan Order. According to the Bardottan member of the Bahk-tov Council Savatte, his shrine was located under the present-day temple on Bardotta. A statue of Malmourral was in this shrine, and was used by the Frangawl cult leader to drain the Living Force from an individual's body, via the living sphere.
